summary: WHEN PUTTING THE VEHICLE INTO PARK AFTER DRIVING IT THE VEHICLE WILL NOT ACKNOWLEDGE THE CAR IS IN PARK. THE VEHICLE IS IN FACT IN PARK AND WILL NOT MOVE, BUT THE PARK INDICATOR LIGHT WILL NOT LIGHT UP AND THE CAR WILL NOT SHUT OFF UNTIL 20 SECONDS TO SEVERAL MINUTES WHEN IT FINALLY FIGURES OUT THAT IT IS IN PARK.
